orig_text: The encryptedValue choice has been deprecated in favor of encryptedData.
correct_text: The encryptedValue choice has been deprecated in favor of envelopedData.

orig_text:
crc[1].status.       present if and only if
   failInfo          crc[0].status.status is "rejection"
crc[1].              present if and only if
   certifiedKeyPair  crc[0].status.status is "accepted"
                     or "grantedWithMods"
correct_text:
crc[1].status.       present if and only if
   failInfo          crc[1].status.status is "rejection"
crc[1].              present if and only if
   certifiedKeyPair  crc[1].status.status is "accepted"
                     or "grantedWithMods"
notes: This is under Initialization Response. It should be crc[1].status.status to correspond to the crc[1] on the left. This error is inherited from RFC 4210 (https://datatracker.ietf.org/doc/html/rfc4210#appendix-D.4).
This is under the genM block, for the "body" field. This error is inherited from RFC 4210 (https://datatracker.ietf.org/doc/html/rfc4210#appendix-E.5).
